 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֶ֫לֶט‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==mortar, cement== (etymology dubious; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***, whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>10</sup>); — [[Jer.43.9|Jer 43:9]].
